name: Commenting Defaults
author: Jari Pennanen

sections.description:
Currently only disables (unchecks) Commenting and Ping Backs from New Page
-form.

Aim of this project is to eventually allow defining default values of Allow
commenting and Ping Backs for all registered Custom Post Types straight from the Settings -> Discussion.
sections.changelog:
• v0.1 (27. September 2011): Initial version, unchecks the Commenting and Ping
    Backs from New Page -form.
